remarks:
Contraposition.  Theorem *2.16 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 103.  This was the fourth axiom of Frege, specifically Proposition 28 of [Frege1879] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-Feb-2013.)
